Summary: just caught my eye in the upper hand right corner,after downloading.pink blob is just lens flare......
divs: sighting detailsjust wanting to clarify that this object is in the upper right hand corner.had to zoom in to see.the pink blob and red arc are just lens flare.this sighting has been misconscrewed as the pink blob as the object,not so....along with the pic i sent in a couple of yrs ago.,it really makes you wonder what is floating\traveling out there that we cannot see with the naked eye!!!!people tend to think ufos are either disc shaped or triangle,and etc.these objects are still ufos-but a different sort???i am resending with more clarity,the same pic and the other one from 2010..thank you
